Game Reference Key: [The key used by the game to find strings]
Notes: [Not loaded into the game, for explanation only]
Requires Suffix: [Does this require a suffix for naming?]

Notes:
Would you like to enable the tutorial text to guide you through how to play? This is recommended for new players.

In Shadows of Doubt the tutorial will guide you through how to use mechanics, though connecting the dots throughout the case is on your shoulders detective!

Help can also be accessed at any time through your 'Detective Handbook' through the main menu, or with |controls.notebook| and selecting the 'help' section.
Displayed Text:
Chcete povolit vyukovy text, ktery vas provede hrou? To doporucujeme novym hracum.

V Shadows of Doubt vas tutorial provede pouzivanim mechanik, i kdyz propojeni bodu v celem pripadu je na vasich detektivnich bedrech!

Napoveda je take kdykoli pristupna prostrednictvim vasi 'detektivni prirucky' v hlavnim menu nebo pomoci |controls.notebook| a vyberem sekce napoveda"."

Notes: You've reached the end of the guided story mission. You still have plenty to do and explore, but it will be without guidance. It's up to you now detective...\n\nRemember: You can still enable or disable gameplay hints using the game option menu at any time.
Displayed Text: Dosahli jste konce pribehove mise s pruvodcem. Stale mate co delat a prozkoumavat, ale bude to bez vedeni. Nyni je to na vas, detektive...\n\nPamatujte: Herni napovedy muzete kdykoli zapnout nebo vypnout pomoci nabidky moznosti hry.

Notes: In addition to your apartment, you'll often be able to find city directories in public places such as bars and restaurants.
Displayed Text: Krome sveho bytu muzete casto najit mestske adresare i na verejnych mistech, jako jsou bary a restaurace.

Notes: You can return to your apartment any time you like. To find it, open the map and use the small button with the house icon to the upper left.
Displayed Text: Do sveho apartmanu se muzete vratit, kdykoli budete chtit. Chcete-li jej najit, otevrete mapu a pouzijte male tlacitko s ikonou domu vlevo nahore.

Notes: You must restart the game for the new language to take effect. Would you like to do this now? Make sure you have saved your game!
Displayed Text: Aby se novy jazyk projevil, musite hru restartovat. Chcete to udelat nyni? Ujistete se, ze jste hru ulozili!

Notes: Your inventory is full! Please drop something to purchase this item...
Displayed Text: Vas inventar je plny! Uhodte prosim neco, abyste si mohli zakoupit tuto polozku...

Notes: Create a new case board with this name.
Displayed Text: Vytvorte novou desku pripadu s timto nazvem.

Notes: There is no active case selected. Would you like to create a new one?
Displayed Text: Neni vybran zadny aktivni pripad. Chcete vytvorit novy?

Notes: Are you sure you want to close this case? You'll lose all pinned information on your board.
Displayed Text: Urcite chcete tento pripad uzavrit? Prijdete o vsechny pripnute informace na nastence.

Notes: Are you sure you want to delete this city?
Enter the name of the save game.
Input the first name and surname of a citizen.
Input the name of a location.

In Shadows of Doubt there are almost always multiple ways to carry out an investigation: Here are the current available leads, choose one as a start to be guided through. Remember: In the main game you'll have to think for yourself detective! In addition, due to the simulated nature of the game, some leads could be dead ends (just part of the job).\n\n<u>If you think you have enough information to solve the case, fill in the resolution form using the button in the upper right.</u>
Displayed Text: Ve hre Stiny pochybnosti existuje temer vzdy vice zpusobu, jak vest vysetrovani: Zde jsou uvedeny aktualni dostupne cesty, vyberte si jednu z nich a nechte se ji provest. Nezapomente: V hlavni hre budete muset premyslet sami za sebe, detektive! Navic vzhledem k simulovane povaze hry mohou byt nektere stopy slepymi ulickami (proste soucast prace).\n\n<u>Pokud si myslite, ze mate dostatek informaci k vyreseni pripadu, vyplnte formular pro reseni pomoci tlacitka vpravo nahore.</u>

Notes: You cannot close the story case at this moment.
Displayed Text: V tuto chvili nemuzete pripad pribehu uzavrit.

Notes: Unfortunately your time limit has come to an end detective. Hopefully our paths will cross again in the full version...
Displayed Text: Vas casovy limit bohuzel vyprsel, detektive. Doufejme, ze se nase cesty opet zkrizi v plne verzi...

Notes:
Welcome to this Shadows of Doubt Demo! We're really excited for you to play, but please know this version is limited in functionality and play time.

The game is also still very much in development, so expect a few bugs here and there. Don't worry, we'll get them fixed for the final release.

 Enjoy! 
-Cole, Developer
Displayed Text:
Vitejte v ukazce hry Shadows of Doubt! Jsme opravdu nadseni, ze si muzete zahrat, ale vezte, ze tato verze je omezena co do funkcnosti a herni doby.

Hra je take stale ve vyvoji, takze ocekavejte tu a tam nejake chyby. Nebojte se, do finalni verze je opravime.

 Uzijte si to! 
-Cole, vyvojar

Notes: Are you sure you want to install this sync disk configuration?\n\nOnce installed, the configuration cannot be changed without reinstalling another sync disk of the same type.
Displayed Text: Urcite chcete nainstalovat tuto konfiguraci Sync disku?\n\nPo instalaci nelze konfiguraci zmenit bez opetovne instalace jineho Sync disku stejneho typu.

Notes: Are you sure you want to uninstall this sync disk?\n\nOnce uninstalled you will have to acquire another sync disk of the same type to install again.
Displayed Text: Jste si jisti, ze chcete tento Sync disk odinstalovat?\n\nPo odinstalovani si budete muset poridit jiny Sync disk stejneho typu a znovu jej nainstalovat.

Notes: Are you sure you want to spend an upgrade vial upgrading this sync disk? You will not be able to undo this action.
Displayed Text: Jste si jisti, ze chcete utratit lahvicku na upgrade tohoto Sync disku? Tuto akci nebude mozne vratit zpet.

Notes: Are you ready to retire to the Fields retirement district? This will end the game for this character...
Displayed Text: Jste pripraveni odejit do duchodu do duchodoveho okrsku Fields? Tim pro tuto postavu hra konci...

Notes: Looks like you're wandering off! The first section explains how some of the basic mechanics of the game work, do you want to go back to your apartment to play through it? Otherwise, you can skip the first section, or simply cancel and continue to explore.\n\nTip: If you don't want to follow objectives at all, we recommend starting a game in 'Sandbox mode'.
Displayed Text: Vypada to, ze jste se zatoulali! V prvni casti je vysvetleno, jak funguji nektere zakladni mechanismy hry, chcete se vratit do sveho bytu a projit si ji? V opacnem pripade muzete prvni cast preskocit nebo ji jednoduse zrusit a pokracovat v pruzkumu.\n\nTip: Pokud se vubec nechcete ridit cili, doporucujeme zacit hru v rezimu Sandbox"."

Notes: Do you want to purchase this?
Do you want to sell this?

Not every lead you investigate will prove fruitful.\n\nIt's all part of the job detective, move onto the next lead when you're ready, or if you think you have enough information to solve the case, input it into the resolve form.
Displayed Text: Ne kazda stopa, kterou proverite, se ukaze jako plodna.To vse je soucasti detektivni prace.Az budete pripraveni, prejdete na dalsi stopu, nebo pokud si myslite, ze mate dostatek informaci k vyreseni pripadu, zadejte je do formulare pro reseni.

Notes: The selected city was generated with an older version of the game, it may not work with this version.\n\nIt is highly recommended you load a city generated with a newer version of the game.
Displayed Text: Vybrane mesto bylo vygenerovano ve starsi verzi hry, v teto verzi nemusi fungovat.\n\nDurazne doporucujeme nacist mesto vygenerovane v novejsi verzi hry.

Notes: You cannot rename this evidence type.
Are you sure you want to take this item?
Displayed Text: Jste si jisti, ze si chcete tuto polozku vzit?

Notes: You cannot open another case, please close one and try again.
Displayed Text: Nemuzete otevrit dalsi pripad, zavrete ho a zkuste to znovu.

Notes: Enter the name of the channel so the viewer names can be gathered and used as citizen names in your game.
Displayed Text: Zadejte nazev kanalu, aby bylo mozne shromazdit jmena divaku a pouzit je ve hre jako jmena obcanu.

Notes: Shadows of Doubt contains a small number of licensed music tracks on its in-game jukebox and stereo systems. If you plan on streaming or recording a monetized video of the game it is recommended to disable them.\n\nYou can change this setting at any time through the Streaming Settings menu.
Displayed Text: Hra Shadows of Doubt obsahuje maly pocet licencovanych hudebnich skladeb v hernim jukeboxu a stereo systemu. Pokud planujete streamovat nebo nahravat zpoplatnene video ze hry, doporucujeme je vypnout.\n\nToto nastaveni muzete kdykoli zmenit prostrednictvim nabidky Nastaveni streamovani.

Notes: Do you want to purchase this décor item?
Displayed Text: Chcete si tento dekoracni predmet zakoupit?

Notes: Do you want to move everything in this room into storage?
Displayed Text: Chcete vsechno v teto mistnosti prestehovat do skladu?

Notes: The name of this bug (usually a short summary)
Enter more specific details on this bug...
Displayed Text: Zadejte dalsi podrobnosti o teto chybe...

Notes: Your info is being submitted, you can continue playing while this happens. Thank you for your input and helping us improve Shadows of Doubt!
Displayed Text: Vase udaje se odesilaji, muzete pokracovat ve hre. Dekujeme vam za vase prispevky a pomoc pri zlepsovani hry Shadows of Doubt!

Notes: Please wait at least 15 seconds between bug reports...
Displayed Text: Mezi jednotlivymi hlasenimi o chybach pockejte prosim alespon 15 sekund...
Preskocit na dalsi cast vyukoveho programu

Notes: Are you sure you want to purchase this apartment?
Displayed Text: Jste si jisti, ze chcete tento byt koupit?

Notes: This will revert ALL game settings to their defaults and restart the game. Make sure you have saved your game!
Displayed Text: Timto se vrati VSECHNA nastaveni hry na vychozí hodnoty a hra se restartuje. Ujistete se, že jste hru ulozili!
